alert.note: Alert for Fisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 11:02PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fisher County through 1145 PM CST... At 1101 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Hermleigh, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hobbs around 1110 PM CST. Rotan and Roby around 1120 PM CST. Sylvester around 1130 PM CST. Mccaulley around 1135 PM CST. Hamlin around 1145 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gannon, Hitson, Busby, Capitola and Us-180 Near The Fisher-Scurry County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west central Texas.
